title: Safety: in danger out of doors
creator_credit: Karl H. Dempwolf, S.M. Tapper and Film Company of America
brief_description: Safety woman saves children from the dangers of the outdoors. Covers boat safety, hiking and climbing. Stars Susan Valdez. Narrated by Tony Barr. Suitable for middle primary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Karl H. Dempwolf, S.M. Tapper and Film Company of America
